product_name: MaryJanesFarm Organic Black Beans and Rice - Single Serving
long_description: Add a little spice to your next trail meal with this delectable blend of black beans, rice and cheese from MaryJanesFarm. A vegetarian dish made with all-natural, USDA Organic ingredients. Just add boiling water, stir and let stand in pouch before serving. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Add a little spice to your next trail meal with this delectable blend of black beans, rice and cheese from MaryJanesFarm.
